title: Hand.of.Fate-CODEX
description:
Hand of Fate [MULTI][CODEX]
Title: Hand of Fate-CODEX
Genre: Action, Indie, RPG
Developer: Defiant Development
Publisher: Defiant Development
Languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Hungarian


Deckbuilding comes to life in Hand of Fate!
An infinitely replayable series of quests Ã¢â‚¬â€œ earn new cards, build your deck, then try to defeat it!

Beyond the thirteen gates at the end of the world, the game of life and death is played. Draw your cards, play your hand, and discover your fate. Hand of Fate is a hybrid roguelike/action-RPG/deck builder, in which the player builds a set of cards into a deck, which is then used to deal out the dungeon floors through which they adventure. Upon entering a combat, all of the cards the player has collected fly into their hands as fully modeled 3D assets, and combat begins.

Build your deck, enter the world of Hand of Fate, and prepare to face the Ace of Skulls.

Features:



Key Features

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Visceral action-RPG combat.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Game changing gear and items make every play through unique.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Hundreds of encounters, items, armor, weapons, artifacts, and mysteries to unlock.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Unique deck building mechanics let you customise your own adventure, as you seek to defeat the Jack, Queen and King of each suit. 



Installation:

1. Mount image, install the game 
2. Copy the contents of the "CODEX" in a folder with a game, replace . 
3. Play 


Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying
to go online
